entities.name: sweeps
entities.description: Sweeps are mentioned as being chained and padlocked to a stout iron peg in the wall behind Umbridge's desk.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is described as sitting behind her desk, busily scribbling upon some of her pink parchment.

entities.name: argus
entities.description: Argus is mentioned as being thanked by Umbridge for something.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is described as bowing low and exiting backward after speaking with Umbridge.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as sitting in a chair and watching the kittens gamboling around Umbridge's head.

entities.name: kittens
entities.description: Kittens are described as gamboling around the plates over Umbridge's head.

entities.name: tea
entities.description: Tea is mentioned as one of the options for Harry to drink.

entities.name: coffee
entities.description: Coffee is mentioned as another option for Harry to drink.

entities.name: pumpkin juice
entities.description: Pumpkin juice is mentioned as a third option for Harry to drink.

entities.name: peg
entities.description: A peg in the wall behind Umbridge's desk is mentioned as being used to chain and padlock the sweeps.

entities.name: desk
entities.description: Umbridge's desk is described as being behind which the sweeps are chained and padlocked.

relationships.description: Filch spoke to Umbridge before exiting backward.
Harry interacted with Umbridge by sitting in a chair and watching the kittens gamboling around her head.
Tea was one of the options for Harry to drink.
Coffee was another option for Harry to drink.
Pumpkin juice was a third option for Harry to drink.
Umbridge used the peg in the wall behind her desk to chain and padlock the sweeps.
